value:
$WmMPID_ソニア,ch10_10_Sonya_F_Normal,Face|I can't take much more of this! I've
lost count of how many we've
defeated... But they keep coming!$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Normal,Face|It's been so long... So long that I can't
even remember HOW long.
Everyone's exhausted...$k$pYet they press us, relentlessly. At
this rate, I just don't know...$k$pOh, Alm...$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|Celica!$k$p$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Normal,Face|Alm? Alm! Is that really you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|You're all right. Thank goodness!
Take a deep breath. It's going to be
OK.$k$pI'll save you from this... I swear it!$k$p

$WmMPID_セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_Normal,Face|The vortex... It's disappearing.$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|I can't believe my eyes. The ground
had cracked open...but now...$k$pIt's like time has run in reverse.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest is gone. Both space
and time have quieted.$k$pWell done, Heroes from the World
of Shadows. The danger has
receded. Your world is safe.$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|Marth, I thank you. We owe you much
for this.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Thanks aren't necessary. Your world
holds special meaning for me, too.
It must be protected.$k$pI visited here myself...some time ago.$k$pThough I suppose it would be more
accurate to say that it was far in the
future...$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|The future, you say?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I must go. It has been an honor to
meet you, Alm—the other Hero-King.$k$pI can only hope we will meet again.
I bid you farewell, Heroes!$k$p
